function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misinformation and cyberchondria spread through excessive consumption of COVID-19 content on social media.","Impact":"Increased spread of misinformation and amplification of cyberchondria, contributing to public anxiety and fear.","Mitigation":"Implement interventions to nudge people to consume manageable amounts of COVID-19 content, educate social media users to consume content in a sustainable manner, and restrict the amount of COVID-19 specific information people are exposed to.","Technologies":"Social media algorithms, educational campaigns, content restrictions.","People":"Social media users, general public.","Owner":"Health organizations, social media companies."}]}
